markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Electric Counter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2732) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Winds Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=463)

**Trigger**
You would take damage.

**Requirements**
You are in [Wild Winds stance](/Spells.aspx?ID=489).

</column>

---

You gain resistance to electricity equal to your level until the start of your next turn. If the triggering damage was electricity, this resistance applies to it. If the triggering damage was from a melee attack, the attacker takes 3d6 electricity damage.

**Special** This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of ki spells you cast, either [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) or [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120).
name: Electric Counter
requirement: You are in  Wild Winds stance .
search_markdown:
<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Winds Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=463)

**Trigger**
You would take damage.

**Requirements**
You are in [Wild Winds stance](/Spells.aspx?ID=489).

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.
</summary>
summary: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.
summary_markdown: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.
